root.name: Xenon 2: Megablast
root.description: Developed by The Bitmap Brothers for the Amiga and Atari ST as a sequel to the original Xenon (also developed by them), Xenon 2 is widely regarded as a class of the 'SHMUP' genre. It is also one of the Bitmap Brothers' most renowned games, responsible for a large part of their cult following in retro gaming, and long-standing good reputation.Part of the game's legacy stems from its difficulty, considered extremely steep even by genre standards.It was later ported to many platforms including the PC (which added a post completion bonus mode) and the Sega Genesis.The Bomb the Bass song "Megablast" was used on the sound track to this game. Its presence explains the game's subtitle.
